summary: Set up /admin with the same shadcn/ui template structure as /app. Installed all missing dependencies (TanStack Router, Query, axios, sonner, etc.), copied routing structure, context providers, components, features, stores, lib, config, and styles. Updated vite.config.ts with TanStack Router plugin, created main.tsx with proper Sentry tags for admin.currentmesh.com, and updated index.html. Admin service restarted and running successfully.
current_status: Admin subdomain (/admin) now has the same full shadcn/ui template structure as /app. All dependencies installed, template files copied, and service running on port 5002. Ready for development. /client subdomain still needs discussion for Next.js template adaptation.
